p: The C. intybus tincture effect on acute kidney injury (AKI) induced by gentamicin (GENTA) was also evaluated in the present study. The renal function test serum creatinine (SCr), serum urea (SU), urine creatinine (UCr), urine urea (UU) and creatinine clearance (CrCl) are summarized in Table 6. The serum oxidative stress markers and NF-Kb levels are outlined in Table 7.
